## Validators.enumeratedValue() function

Helper function to create a [Validation.Validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md) which validates an enumerated value in place.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function enumeratedValue<T extends string>(values: T[]): Validator<T, T[]>;
```
